knimeNode.name: Size Manager
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns sizes corresponding to the values of one numeric column.

fullDescription.intro: Assigns sizes corresponding to the values of the selected numeric column. The higher the value the higher the size.
fullDescription.option: Select one column from which size should be derived.
Adjust the maximal scaling factor, i.e. the entered value results in the maximal magnification. If the entered factor is n, the maximal value will be n times larger than the minimal value.
Select which mapping method to use, to map the domain onto the scaled range.

ports.inPort: Datatable with column for size assignment
ports.outPort: Sizes applied to the input table
